name: Brawnfire
description:
Night sets quickly, and the creatures begin to come out. Keep your fire burning till morning.

Inspired by brawler / beat 'em up genres of the 90's, the game evolved as we explored it. Can you survive the night?


Made with
- Haxe; / HaxeFlixel -
- FLStudio -
- Pyxel Edit -
- Tiled -

Controls:

Movement -- WASD / Arrow Keys

Punch/Pickup/Throw -- Space / Left Click
